p.codeblock: DECLARE_DYNAMIC_MULTICAST_DELEGATE_ThreeParams(FOnAudioDeviceStateChanged, FString, deviceId, int, deviceType, int, deviceState);
public virtual void OnAudioDeviceStateChanged(string deviceId, MEDIA_DEVICE_TYPE deviceType, MEDIA_DEVICE_STATE_TYPE deviceState) { }
final void Function(String deviceId, MediaDeviceType deviceType, MediaDeviceStateType deviceState)? onAudioDeviceStateChanged;

section.p: 提示系统音频设备状态发生改变，比如耳机被拔出。
section.note: 该方法仅适用于 Windows 和 macOS。
